name: CleverTower
overview:
Property management software with tenant focus.

CleverTower provides tools for both landlords and tenants, effectively bringing them together.

For landlords, CleverTower provides property management over leases, tenants, income and expenses. Landlords can advertise listings and accept applications through the site. They can also communicate with existing tenants and moderate posts and ideas for the property.

For tenants, CleverTower is a social network. Tenants join their property’s network to communicate with other tenants and their landlord. They can suggest ideas on how to improve the property. They may also search advertised listings to find their next home.
